name: Rogues's Adventure
description:
Rogue's Adventure is a small game, you play the little Rogue who want to collect every coins in the world but the world is dangerous for you.

You have to find your path through 5 levels, each level want your death.

Information : 

Made with Unity.

The Rogue has 100hp, one hit remove 50hp. 

If you die, you respawn at the start of the level.
